about_the_game:
Private Dick: Lipstick & Lies is an opulent, hard-boiled visual novel set in a seedy modern world of deception, betrayal, scheming and lashing of joyful depravity.

Follow Private Detective Sam Steele through the Red Tie case.

Steele is drinking alone his favourite dive bar when Emily (Just Emily) turns up with a case. It seems Emily is being followed and wants Steele to either find the culprit or offer him a little peace of mind.

Meet the beautiful British P.A. Emily, the quirky technical support Minty Collada, and bargirl Bobbi. All characters are fully voiced.

The Red Tie demo is a simplified, on-rails tour through a short story from the wider Private Dick story. Check out the full game for more features, including:

  • Diverse cast of compelling, unpredictable femme fatales
  • Lovingly illustrated, interactive sex scenes
  • Dialogue so sharp you can cut yourself
  • Fully voiced audio track
  • Open world exploration
  • Original soundtrack
  • In-depth social network

Sexual Content


Private Dick takes a mature, sophisticated and balanced approach to the depiction of women and sexuality. At the same time, it strives to be creative, exciting and innovative in its sex scenes.

All characters are over the age of 18, all sex acts are fully consensual, and players can opt out of any scene.

content_descriptors.notes: This game features explicit depictions of sexual acts between  consenting adults.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: CPU: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: CPU: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version: 10.10+
  • Processor: CPU: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics: OpenGL 3.0

name: Private Dick: Red Tie Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and Newer
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics

short_description: An erotic mystery like no other. Step into the gumshoes of private detective Sam Steele in this opulent, hard-boiled visual novel. This ain't a love story.
